scripts.test: esy x refmt --parse re --print ml ./jsx_ppx/test.re > ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test.ml && esy x ocamlfind ppx_tools/rewriter reactjs_jsx_ppx_v3 ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test.ml > ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/testout.ml && rm ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test.ml
scripts.test-406: esy @406 x refmt --parse re --print ml ./jsx_ppx/test.re > ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test.ml && esy @406 x ocamlfind ppx_tools/rewriter reactjs_jsx_ppx_v3 ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test.ml > ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/testout.ml && rm ./jsx_ppx/artifacts/test.ml
